title: Error when building flac on HPC
body:
Hi,

I want to report an issue with building the `flac` library on our HPC.

Everything we have is built with spack

```
[aryczkowski@dn:~] 6s 1 $ spack --debug --verbose install flac
==> Reading config file /cfs/fs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/etc/spack/defaults/packages.yaml
```

The package builds just fine on vanilla Ubuntu 16.04. There is something wrong with our HPC. I suspect it has something to do with the ASM compiler, but this should have been installed with Spack as a dependency, shouldn't it?
